message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language) - The paper focuses on speech recognition, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP) and falls under the scope of cs.CL. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper also deals with visual modalities and their fusion with speech for speech recognition, which falls under the scope of cs.CV. 
3. cs.SD (Sound) - The paper deals with audio signals and their processing for speech recognition, which falls under the scope of cs.SD. 
4. cs.LG (Machine Learning) - The paper extensively uses deep learning techniques for multimodal learning, which falls under the scope of cs.LG. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper deals with the fusion of speech and visual modalities for speech recognition, which falls under the scope of cs.MM.
